citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
An attending veterinarian was not employed under formal arrangements from November 2022 until March 2024.
According to the facility Director, the licensee continued to work with veterinarians to provide clinical veterinary care to
animals after the AV resigned from that role, but did not have an attending veterinarian overseeing animal health and
wellbeing during that time. Exhibitors must employ an attending veterinarian under formal arrangements with appropriate
authority to ensure the provision of adequate veterinary care and to oversee the adequacy of other aspects of animal care
and use.
At the time of inspection, a part time veterinarian was employed in the role, but no written program of veterinary care
under the current attending veterinarian's authority was in place at the facility. To ensure that animals are cared for in
accordance with the attending veterinarian's guidance, part-time attending veterinarians must be employed under formal
arrangements which include a written program of veterinary care.
In order to ensure the provision of adequate veterinary care, exhibitors shall employ an attending veterinarian under
formal arrangements to oversee the adequacy of animal care and use. The formal arrangements shall include a written
program of veterinary care and regularly scheduled visits to the premises.
To be corrected by June 10th, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility Director and the Attending Veterinarian.
n

narrative:
2.40(a) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
An attending veterinarian was not employed under formal arrangements from November 2022 until March 2024. 
According to the facility Director, the licensee continued to work with veterinarians to provide clinical veterinary care to 
animals after the AV resigned from that role, but did not have an attending veterinarian overseeing animal health and 
wellbeing during that time. Exhibitors must employ an attending veterinarian under formal arrangements with appropriate 
authority to ensure the provision of adequate veterinary care and to oversee the adequacy of other aspects of animal care 
and use.  
 
At the time of inspection, a part time veterinarian was employed in the role, but no written program of veterinary care 
under the current attending veterinarian's authority was in place at the facility. To ensure that animals are cared for in 
accordance with the attending veterinarian's guidance, part-time attending veterinarians must be employed under formal 
arrangements which include a written program of veterinary care.  
 
In order to ensure the provision of adequate veterinary care, exhibitors shall employ an attending veterinarian under 
formal arrangements to oversee the adequacy of animal care and use. The formal arrangements shall include a written 
program of veterinary care and regularly scheduled visits to the premises.  
 
To be corrected by June 10th, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility Director and the Attending Veterinarian.
